title: Op-ed | You canâ€™t go to space on a Ford Pinto and other harsh truths I learned courting venture capital
summary: The article is an opinion piece by Ignacio Chechile, former VP of spacecraft engineering at ICEYE, reflecting on his experiences fundraising for a space startup. It discusses the challenges of securing venture capital, the lack of space technology knowledge among VCs, and the shortcomings of the current VC model in the space sector.
